description: This Dart source file defines the AuthService class, which manages user authentication processes such as login, registration, token storage, and retrieval for a Flutter application interacting with a backend API.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: A service class providing authentication functionalities including login, registration, JWT token management, and authorization header retrieval.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Attempts to authenticate the user with email and password, storing the JWT token on success.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user with provided email and password.

methods.name: isAuthenticated
methods.description: Checks whether a user is currently authenticated based on stored JWT token.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Deletes the stored JWT token, effectively logging out the user.

methods.name: getJwtToken
methods.description: Retrieves the stored JWT token from secure storage.

methods.name: _getJwtToken
methods.description: Reads the JWT token from secure storage.

methods.name: getAuthHeader
methods.description: Returns authorization headers including the Bearer token for authenticated API requests.
